short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a download button to soundgasm.net audio files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Soundgasm download button provides an easy way for users to download their favorite soundgasm.net audio files by providing a button to download the audio file with its track name and the artist's username included.
